String.string: (Guild) Order to Subjugate the Whitefrost Forest
Thank you for your hard work.
Token of Subjugating the Whitefrost Forest
Kill {@Creature:47#1001#Tirkai grizzlies}, {@Creature:47#1002#argonomorph Tirkai grizzlies}, and {@Creature:47#1003$$argonomorph mugatos} in the {@Rgn:47002$$Whitefrost Forest} and collect tokens.
Report to Laetesha at Pathfinder Post when mission is complete.
